en: Created in 1986, the Domaine de la MORDOREE (poetic name of the Woodcock) produces great wines of the Rhone Valley: Tavel, Château-neuf du pape, Lirac, Côtes du Rhône, Condrieu. 58 hectares of vines spread over 38 parcels and 8 communes. The estate is committed to organic farming since 2010. Today all our wines are organic and made from DEMETER certified biodynamic grapes. Our wines are still made from manual harvesting and rigorous sorting. Our farm is certified HVE (High Environmental Value).Domaine de la Mordorée offers three different wine tourism activities: A visit of the vineyard + wine tasting: 26 euros per person for a duration of 2h00 to 3h00. By appointment and minimum 6 persons. A walk in the vineyard of Tavel followed by a tasting of our wines in our tasting cellar. A gourmet tasting for 28 euros per person, by appointment, with a minimum of 6 people. Discover our wines with a plate of cold cuts, cheeses and quality vegetables. A visit of the vineyard + gourmet tasting for 49 euros per person for a duration of 2:30 to 3:30 hours. By appointment and minimum 6 persons. Discover our biodynamic vineyard, its fauna and flora in the village of Tavel and then taste our wines accompanied by a board of charcuterie, cheese and quality vegetables. We also offer the Villa d'Ambre, a seasonal rental located in Tavel, with a capacity of 12 people maximum. The Villa d'Ambre has a large living room with a panoramic view of the Mont Ventoux vineyards, a kitchen, a dining room, a terrace, a garden, a secure parking lot, wifi and a large swimming pool. Find all the information on our website: https://www.domaine-mordoree.com/location-pour-vacances-23.html Open all year round.the domain is open from May to September from Monday to Friday from 8am to 6.30pm and Saturday from 10am to 5pm / from October to April from Monday to Friday from 8am to 12pm 1.30pm to 5.30pmContact : 0466500075 / info@domaine-mordoree.comLivraison in France and for export possible.Click and Collect/Retract of goods possible at the domain.

en:
Created in 1986, the Domaine de la MORDOREE (poetic name of the Woodcock) produces great wines of the Rhone Valley: Tavel, Château-neuf du pape, Lirac, Côtes du Rhône, Condrieu. 58 hectares of vines spread over 38 parcels and 8 communes.
The estate is committed to organic farming since 2010. Today all our wines are organic and made from DEMETER certified biodynamic grapes

Our wines are still made from manual harvesting and rigorous sorting
Our farm is certified HVE (High Environmental Value).

The Domaine de la Mordorée offers three different wine tourism activities
A visit of the vineyard + wine tasting: 26 euros per person for a duration of 2h00 to 3h00. By appointment and minimum 6 persons. A walk in the vineyard of Tavel followed by a tasting of our wines in our tasting cellar

A gourmet tasting for 28 euros per person, by appointment, with a minimum of 6 people. Discover our wines with a board of charcuterie, cheese and quality vegetables

A visit of the vineyard + gourmet tasting for 49 euros per person for a duration of 2:30 to 3:30 hours. By appointment and minimum 6 persons. Discover our biodynamic vineyard, its fauna and flora in the village of Tavel and then taste our wines accompanied by a board of charcuterie, cheese and quality vegetables

We also offer the Villa d'Ambre, a seasonal rental located in Tavel, with a capacity of 12 people maximum. The Villa d'Ambre has a large living room with a panoramic view of the Mont Ventoux vineyards, a kitchen, a dining room, a terrace, a garden, a secure parking, wifi and a large swimming pool.
Find all the information on our website : https://www.domaine-mordoree.com/location-pour-vacances-23.html

Open all year round.
The domain is open from May to September from Monday to Friday from 8am to 6:30pm and Saturday from 10am to 5pm / from October to April from Monday to Friday from 8am to 12pm 1:30pm to 5:30pm

Contact : 0466500075 / info@domaine-mordoree.com

Delivery in France and export possible.
Click and Collect / Collection of goods possible at the domain.
fr:
Crée en 1986 le Domaine de la MORDOREE (nom poétique de la Bécasse des bois) produit des grands crus de la Vallée du Rhône : Tavel, Château-neuf du pape, Lirac, Côtes du Rhône, Condrieu. 58 hectares de vignes réparties sur 38 parcelles et 8 communes.
Le domaine est engagé en agriculture biologique depuis 2010. Aujourd'hui l'ensemble de nos vins sont biologiques et issus de raisins certifiés Biodynamie DEMETER. 

Nos vins sont toujours issus de vendanges manuelles et d'un tri rigoureux. 
Notre exploitation est certifiée HVE (Haute Valeur Environnementale).

Le Domaine de la Mordorée propose trois activités oenotouristiques différentes : 
Une visite du vignoble + dégustation des vins : 26 euros par personne pour une durée de 2h00 à 3h00. Sur rendez-vous et minimum 6 personnes. Une randonnée pédestre dans le vignoble de Tavel suivi d'une dégustation de nos vins dans notre caveau de dégustation. 

Une dégustation gourmande pour un tarif de 28 euros par personne, sur rendez-vous, avec 6 personnes minimum. Découvrez nos vins avec une planche de charcuteries, de fromages et de légumes de qualités. 

Une visite du vignoble + dégustation gourmande pour un tarif de 49 euros par personne pour une durée de 2:30 à 3:30h. Sur rendez-vous et minimum 6 personnes. Découvrez notre vignoble en biodynamie, sa faune et sa flore dans le village de Tavel et ensuite dégustez nos vins accompagnés d'une planche de charcuteries, de fromages et de légumes de qualités. 

Nous proposons aussi la Villa d'Ambre, une location saisonnière situé à Tavel, d'une capacité d'accueil de 12 personnes maximum. La Villa d'Ambre possède un grand salon vue panoramique donnant sur le vignoble du Mont Ventoux, une cuisine, une salle à manger, une terrasse, un jardin, un parking sécurisé, le wifi ainsi qu’une grande piscine.
Retrouvez toutes les informations sur notre site internet : https://www.domaine-mordoree.com/location-pour-vacances-23.html 

Ouvert toute l'année.
Le domaine est ouvert de Mai à Septembre du lundi au vendredi de 8h à 18h30 et le samedi de 10h à 17h / d’Octobre à Avril du lundi au vendredi de 8h à 12h 13h30 à17h30

Contact : 0466500075 / info@domaine-mordoree.com

Livraison en France et à l'export possible.
Click and Collect/Retrait de marchandise possible au domaine.
